protocol_name: Euplotes crassus transformation using Lipofectamine 2000 as vehicle
protocol_name_html: Euplotes crassus transformation using Lipofectamine 2000 as vehicle
protocol_affiliation: University of Bern, Institute of Biology
affiliation: University of Bern, Institute of Biology

groups.group_name: Protist Research to Optimize Tools in Genetics (PROT-G)

authors_list.name: RACHELE CESARONI
authors_list.affiliation: University of Bern, Institute of Biology

components.data: Collect 2 x 104 well-fed Euplotes crassus cells (we used E. coli as the only food source) by centrifugation at 400 rcf for 3 minutes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Collect 2 x 104 well-fed Euplotes crassus cells (we used E. coli as the only food source) by centrifugation at 400 rcf for 3 minutes.

components.data: Wash the cells twice with artificial sea water (see attachment for the recipe) and once with 500 mM sorbitol, 0.5 mM Tris-HCl pH 7.0 (400 rcf for 3 minutes each time). Then resuspend Euplotes crassus cells in 50 μl of the medium (500 mM sorbitol, 0.5 mM Tris-HCl pH 7.0). To get this small volume you may require an additional minute of centrifugation.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Wash the cells twice with artificial sea water (see attachment for the recipe) and once with 500 mM sorbitol, 0.5 mM Tris-HCl pH 7.0 (400 rcf for 3 minutes each time). Then resuspend Euplotes crassus cells in 50 μl of the medium (500 mM sorbitol, 0.5 mM Tris-HCl pH 7.0). To get this small volume you may require an additional minute of centrifugation.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 2 of Euplotes crassus transformation using Lipofectamine 2000 as vehicle
source_data.protocol_name: Euplotes crassus transformation using Lipofectamine 2000 as vehicle
source_data.protocol_name_html: Euplotes crassus transformation using Lipofectamine 2000 as vehicle
source_data.annotation:
Recipe for complete sea water (1 L):

36 g Reef Crystals
1 ml Walne's solution
1 ml of 10 μg/ml FeSO4

0.2 ml of 2 mg/ml thiamine (light sensîtive; store at 4 ºC)
Add distilled water to 1 L
source_data.thread_text:

components.data: Transfer the cells into two wells within a 96-well plates for transfection.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer the cells into two wells within a 96-well plates for transfection.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 3 of Euplotes crassus transformation using Lipofectamine 2000 as vehicle
source_data.protocol_name: Euplotes crassus transformation using Lipofectamine 2000 as vehicle
source_data.protocol_name_html: Euplotes crassus transformation using Lipofectamine 2000 as vehicle
source_data.annotation: We used one of the wells for the negative control.
source_data.thread_text: We used one of the wells for the negative control.
source_data.body: We used one of the wells for the negative control.
source_data.affiliation: University of Bern, Institute of Biology

components.data: Dilute 2.5 μl of Lipofectamine 2000 Reagent in 25 μl of the same medium of the cells (500 mM sorbitol, 0.5 mM Tris-HCl pH 7.0).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Dilute 2.5 μl of Lipofectamine 2000 Reagent in 25 μl of the same medium of the cells (500 mM sorbitol, 0.5 mM Tris-HCl pH 7.0).

components.data: Dilute 5 μg of DNA (0.5-5 μg/μl) dissolved in MilliQ H2O in 125 μl of the same medium of the cells (500 mM sorbitol, 0.5 mM Tris-HCl pH 7.0).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Dilute 5 μg of DNA (0.5-5 μg/μl) dissolved in MilliQ H2O in 125 μl of the same medium of the cells (500 mM sorbitol, 0.5 mM Tris-HCl pH 7.0).

components.data: Add 25 μl of the diluted DNA to 25 μl of the diluted Lipofectamine 2000 Reagent (1:1 ratio) and incubate for 10 minutes at room temperature (before incubation mix by pipetting up and down 5 times or vortex for 10 seconds).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 25 μl of the diluted DNA to 25 μl of the diluted Lipofectamine 2000 Reagent (1:1 ratio) and incubate for 10 minutes at room temperature (before incubation mix by pipetting up and down 5 times or vortex for 10 seconds).

components.data: Add 10 μl of the transfection complexes drop-wise to one of the two wells containing 50 μl of Euplotes crassus cells in medium (gently swirl the dish to ensure uniform distribution of the transfection complexes).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 10 μl of the transfection complexes drop-wise to one of the two wells containing 50 μl of Euplotes crassus cells in medium (gently swirl the dish to ensure uniform distribution of the transfection complexes).

components.data: One hour after addition of Lipofectamine 2000 complexes, add 50 μl of artificial sea water to the cells.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: One hour after addition of Lipofectamine 2000 complexes, add 50 μl of artificial sea water to the cells.

components.data: After another hour, add other 50 μl of artificial sea water to the cells.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: After another hour, add other 50 μl of artificial sea water to the cells.

components.data: An hour later harvest the cells (400 rcf for 3 minutes) and wash them twice with artificial sea water (400 rcf for 3 min each time). Then resuspend them in 400 μl of the artificial sea water.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: An hour later harvest the cells (400 rcf for 3 minutes) and wash them twice with artificial sea water (400 rcf for 3 min each time). Then resuspend them in 400 μl of the artificial sea water.

components.data: Incubate the cells at least for three days at 24 ºC, then analyzeby fluorescence microscopy to determine gene expression.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate the cells at least for three days at 24 ºC, then analyzeby fluorescence microscopy to determine gene expression.
